Enclosing class:
Accelerometer
public static class Accelerometer.AccelerometerEvent
extends AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorEvent

A SensorEvent for Accelerometers. Created because accelerometer uses three axes.

Author:
Colin Poler

Constructs an AnalogSensorEvent from the specified source, value, and delta value.

Parameters:
source - The source of the event.
currentValue - The current value of the sensor.
deltaValue - The delta value of the sensor.
